# Table row selection checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The table row selection affordance shows if a row is selected by displaying a checkbox.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type                                         | Default        |
| ----------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled` | Determines if the component is displayed in its disabled state. | `boolean`                                    | `false`        |
| `selected`  | `selected` | Determines if the component is selected.                        | `boolean \| undefined`                       | `false`        |
| `selection` | --         | The selection in the table.                                     | `HTMLBrTableRowElement[]`                    | `[]`           |
| `size`      | `size`     | Defines the size style applied to the component.                | `"Large" \| "Normal" \| "Small" \| "Xsmall"` | `undefined`    |
| `theme`     | `theme`    | Defines the theme of the component.                             | `"Dark" \| "Light"`                          | `ThemeDefault` |


----------------------------------------------
